oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sauetalle - utprøving av ulike strøslag
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bjørdal, Jorunn
Haga, Knut
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Composting and manuring
Sheep and goats
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The report summarised the practical experiences when straw and turf were used as bedding material for sheep
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Bjørdal, Jorunn and Haga, Knut (1992) Sauetalle - utprøving av ulike strøslag. Norwegian Centre for Ecological Agriculture (NORSØK), Tingvoll,Norway.
